name: lava-runner
description: Execute RockRMS lava templating language from vscode and see the results!

lavaRunner.rootUrl.description: The root URL of your Rock instance. Used for /api calls and as root for resolving relative links in the webview previews. Do not include trailing slash '/'

lavaRunner.endpoint.description: The API endpoint to run Lava files. (Default: /api/Lava/RenderTemplate)

lavaRunner.apiKey.description: The API key for the Lava Runner service. Get from /admin/security/rest-keys in your Rock instance.

lavaRunner.request.lavaToPrepend.title: Lava to Prepend to Each Request
lavaRunner.request.lavaToPrepend.markdownDescription:
(Multi-Line) Use to set default HTML or Lava that will be prepended to each request.

 Useful to set Lava variables that will be used in your template. 

 For Example: `{% assign CurrentPerson = 1234 | PersonById %}`

(Default: empty)

lavaRunner.request.lavaToAppend.title: Lava to Append to the end of each request.
lavaRunner.request.lavaToAppend.markdownDescription:
(Multi-Line) Use to set default HTML or Lava that will be appended to each request. 

 For Example: `{% assign CurrentPerson = 1234 | PersonById %}`

(Default: empty)

lavaRunner.preview.themeCss.description: Relative path to your theme's CSS file. (Default: /Themes/Rock/Styles/theme.css)

lavaRunner.preview.fontAwesomeCdnUrl.description:
Url to load Font Awesome CSS file to make icons work. Leave blank to not include. 

(Default: https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/font-awesome/5.15.3/css/all.min.css)

lavaRunner.preview.chartjsScriptUrl.description:
Url to load Chart.js script from. Leave blamk to not include.

 (Default: https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/Chart.js/2.7.1/Chart.bundle.min.js)

lavaRunner.preview.headContent.title: Other Head Content
lavaRunner.preview.headContent.markdownDescription: (Multi-Line) Content to include in the `<head>` of the preview. Use this to include custom CSS or JavaScript. (Default: empty)

lavaRunner.preview.startBody.title: Content to include at the start of the <body> of the preview.
lavaRunner.preview.startBody.markdownDescription:
(Multi-Line) Content to always include right after the opening `<body>` tag of the preview.

 Note: NOT Lava enabled. (Default: empty)

lavaRunner.preview.endBody.title: Content to include at the end right before the closing `</body>` tag of the preview.
lavaRunner.preview.endBody.markdownDescription:
(Multi-Line) Content to always include right before the closing `</body>` tag of the preview.

 Note: NOT Lava enabled. (Default: empty)

scripts.pretest: npm run compile-tests && npm run compile && npm run lint
